summary: Dragonborn DLC required! Un-clutters and moves the house around to look more appealing
descriptionHtml:
My first ever mod! Have you ever thought that Bethesda has a thing for Barrels and haystacks? Ever wondered why your house in Raven Rock looks like a barn? With this mod your new house in Raven rock has been un-cluttered and moved around . Barrels and haystacks, Large sacks and pots are all removed. Also the weapon racks and mannequins have been re-positioned. 4 new mannequins have been added/ 

This is a work in progress.

This is also my first Mod so there WILL be bugs. I will try to hammer these all out but my modding experience is shallow.

Known errors

Mannequins moving about = leave and re-enter house.

Lighting = Working on it (Think of it as an energy-saving option for your rooms)
Any others = Let me know.

Future plans = 
More mannequins.
More weapon racks.
More rooms.
Followers.
I am open to suggestions. 

Thanks for having a look !

Disclaimer = Do  what you want with this but Add my name to your version.
author: EXx Warlord xX3
